name: Loading Network
Network template
template:
# interfaces(5) file used by ifup(8) and ifdown(8)
# Include files from /etc/network/interfaces.d:
source /etc/network/interfaces.d/*
################### ETH0 ########################
auto eth0
iface eth0 inet static
    address {{payload.address}}
    netmask {{payload.netmask}}
    gateway {{payload.gateway}}
    dns-nameservers {{payload.primary_dns}} {{payload.second_dns}}
    metric 100
#################################################

################## BRIDGE 0 #####################
auto br0
iface br0 inet static
    address 192.168.21.1
    netmask 255.255.255.0
    #gateway 192.168.21.1
    bridge_ports eth1 wlan0-ap
    bridge_stp off              
    bridge_fd 0
    bridge_maxwait 0
#################################################


auto wlan0-ap
iface wlan0-ap inet manual
#################### ETH1 ######################
auto eth1
iface eth1 inet manual
################################################

name: cmd network
new address
new netmask
new gateway
new primary_dns
new second_dns
Loading new MQTT
Loading new MQTT
save config
cmd network
save config
func:
var cfg = global.get("cfg");
return { payload: cfg };
